shortcutMineSubtitleDescription.message: Mine current subtitle. When video is synced without a subtitle file, starts/stops recording audio.

shortcutMineSubtitleAndOpenDialogDescrip.message: Mine current subtitle and open Anki export dialog. When video is synced without a subtitle file, starts/stops recording audio.

shortcutUpdateLastCardDescription.message: Update last-created Anki card with asbplayer-captured media. When video is synced without a subtitle file, starts/stops recording audio.

shortcutTakeScreenshotDescription.message: Manually take screenshot, overriding the one that is automatically taken when mining.

shortcutToggleRecordingDescription.message: Manually start/stop audio recording, even when a subtitle file is loaded.
